**Task:** On average, about 49.4% of college students get their flu vaccine in a given year. Answer each of the following:

:::{.nonincremental}

1. Out of a random sample of 50 students, what is the probability that exactly 25 have gotten their flu vaccine this year?
2. Out of a random sample of 50 students, what is the probability that at most 20 got their flu vaccine this year?

:::
